fields.inlineHelpText: If left blank, the file name of the PDF will be used.
fields.label: Agreement Name
fields.name: Loop__Agreement_Name__c

fields.inlineHelpText: Allows the user to choose to store the DocGen Package based on the Attach As field.
fields.label: Allow Document Storage
fields.name: Loop__AllowOutputAttachment__c

fields.inlineHelpText: Attachment will create a Salesforce attachment; LOOP Storage will create a document in the LOOP Storage interface; Content and Content - User Selected will create a Content document in the appropriate Workspace.
fields.label: Store As
fields.name: Loop__Attach_As__c

fields.inlineHelpText: None or Default will use the default Authoritative Copy setting specified in your DocuSign account configuration.
fields.label: Authoritative Copy
fields.name: Loop__Authoritative_Copy__c

fields.inlineHelpText: This will default the 'Additional To' field when delivering the DocGen Package via email. Use the Field Tagger to use dynamic email addresses.
fields.label: Additional To
fields.name: Loop__CI_Additional_To__c

fields.inlineHelpText: This will default the 'BCC' field when delivering the DocGen Package via email. Use the Field Tagger to use dynamic email addresses.
fields.label: BCC
fields.name: Loop__CI_BCC__c

fields.inlineHelpText: This will default the 'CC' field when delivering the DocGen Package via email. Use the Field Tagger to use dynamic email addresses.
fields.label: CC
fields.name: Loop__CI_CC__c

fields.inlineHelpText: Decryption is currently only supported with CipherCloud. Contact Nintex to enable this for your organization.
fields.label: Decryption Required
fields.name: Loop__Decryption_Required__c

fields.inlineHelpText: Text entered here will be displayed when users hover over this option's info icon.
fields.label: Help Text
fields.name: Loop__Description_Hover__c

fields.inlineHelpText: This option prevents all recipients from using the Print, Sign, and Fax option during the signing process.
fields.label: Disable Sign on Paper
fields.name: Loop__Disable_Wet_Sign__c

fields.inlineHelpText: You can use Box share links in your email templates. Use the appropriate tags from the Field Tagger.
fields.label: Use Box Links
fields.name: Loop__Email_Doc_Links__c

fields.inlineHelpText: The FTP domain where you wish to store the document including any subfolders (e.g. ftp.yoursite.com/folder1/folder2/). The folders can be made dynamic using the Field Tagger.
fields.label: FTP Domain
fields.name: Loop__FTPDomain__c

fields.inlineHelpText: The user name for your FTP domain.
fields.label: Username
fields.name: Loop__FTPUserName__c

fields.inlineHelpText: Select this option if your Email Text includes HTML markup.
fields.label: HTML Email
fields.name: Loop__HTML_Email__c

fields.label: Host Signing for the First Signer
fields.name: Loop__Hosted_Signing__c

fields.inlineHelpText: Checking this option will remove the contact or lead reference on the email page.
fields.label: Internal Email
fields.name: Loop__Internal_Email__c

fields.inlineHelpText: Use the Field Tagger to make this value dynamic.
fields.label: Password
fields.name: Loop__Password__c

fields.inlineHelpText: Format the parameters as if on a query string (paramName=smplVal&p2=sV2). This can be made dynamic using tags from the Field Tagger.
fields.label: Post Parameters
fields.name: Loop__PostParameters__c

fields.inlineHelpText: Text entered here will be displayed if there is a preview step.
fields.label: Preview Step Help Text
fields.name: Loop__Preview_Step_Help_Text__c

fields.inlineHelpText: A URL used to redirect 3rd party processes.
fields.label: Redirect URL
fields.name: Loop__Redirect_URL__c

fields.inlineHelpText: The DocGen Package file will be stored based on the selected storage location. The default is to store the document as an attachment on the originating record.
fields.label: Require Document Storage
fields.name: Loop__RequireOutputAttachment__c

fields.inlineHelpText: If selected, the transfer will be done over SSL.
fields.label: Secure
fields.name: Loop__SSL__c

fields.label: I also need to sign this document
fields.name: Loop__SenderSigns__c

picklistValues.label: I sign, then the Recipient signs
picklistValues.value: I sign, then the Recipient signs

fields.inlineHelpText: Automatically send the DocGen Package to its destination (no PDF preview).
fields.label: Auto Send
fields.name: Loop__SkipPreview__c

fields.inlineHelpText: Type the folder structure for where you want to store the output. You can use the Field Tagger to dynamically determine your folders. Example: folder/sub folder/last folder
fields.label: Storage Folder
fields.name: Loop__Storage_Folder__c

fields.inlineHelpText: This option allows the user to add or move signatures and other signing options on the file before sending out to the recipients.
fields.label: Signing Preview and Edit
fields.name: Loop__Tag_Before_Sending__c

fields.inlineHelpText: If returning an original Word document, this option will turn on tracking within the file.
fields.label: Turn Tracking On
fields.name: Loop__TurnTrackingOn__c

fields.inlineHelpText: If unchecked, the user does not see the processing screen while the DocGen Package is being generated.
fields.label: Wait for document to process
fields.name: Loop__Wait__c

fields.inlineHelpText: If checked, users will be able to change the subject and email text when running a DocGen Package.
fields.label: Allow Subject and Email Changes
fields.name: Loop__dsAllowEmailCustomizations__c

fields.inlineHelpText: Comma-semicolon delimited string: each field separated by a semicolon, each parameter per field separated by a comma. E.g. "custmFld1Name, custmFld1Val; custmFld2Name, <<Account_Id>>". This value is dynamic, see the associated help topic.
fields.label: Custom Envelope Fields
fields.name: Loop__dsCustomFields__c

fields.inlineHelpText: Use the Field Tagger to make this dynamic.
fields.label: Email Text
fields.name: Loop__dsEmailText__c

fields.inlineHelpText: Expire signing in # days. 0 days will never expire.
fields.label: Days till Signing Expires
fields.name: Loop__dsExpireAfter__c

fields.inlineHelpText: Warn of expiration # days prior to expiration.
fields.label: Warn of Expiration
fields.name: Loop__dsExpireWarn__c

fields.inlineHelpText: If selected, the user will be able to change the defaults for the expirations and reminders.
fields.label: Allow Remind and Expire Changes
fields.name: Loop__dsExposeExpirations__c

fields.inlineHelpText: Send Reminder in # days. 0 days will not send a reminder.
fields.label: Reminder Delay
fields.name: Loop__dsReminderDelay__c

fields.inlineHelpText: Repeat reminder every # days until complete.
fields.label: Reminder Frequency
fields.name: Loop__dsReminderFrequency__c

fields.inlineHelpText: Use the Field Tagger to make this dynamic. Examples: "Quote <<Opportunity_Quote_Num>>" or "<<Account_Name>> Proposal".
fields.label: Subject
fields.name: Loop__dsSubject__c

fields.inlineHelpText: The Template Id from the DocuSign Console. When using a Template Id, the roles of the recipients in the template must match the roles of the recipients in the related list below.
fields.label: Template Id
fields.name: Loop__dsTemplateId__c

fields.inlineHelpText: Use a DocGen Package File or Salesforce Email Template for email deliveries.
fields.label: Email Template
fields.name: Loop__Email_Template__c

fields.inlineHelpText: If no option is selected, the default is Enhanced.
fields.label: PDF Option
fields.name: Loop__PDF_Option__c
